
                            
                            <p>早上看到吧友的发的<a href="https://item.jd.com/4134901.html" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">吧虾</a>，单独下单了几次，任豪家的确实规格小了，最后想着过年吗还是买经常买的那款，不知道付款的时候为啥白条减了40 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/082614sylpn65sgnmdpn3m.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/082614sylpn65sgnmdpn3m.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/082622cbbixc6usx38clvv.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/22/082622cbbixc6usx38clvv.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">反复下单了几次</p><p></p>
                            <p>
